Class AlphaZeroConfig.Builder

java.lang.Object
AI.alphazero.config.AlphaZeroConfig.Builder
Enclosing class:
AlphaZeroConfig
public static class AlphaZeroConfig.Builder extends Object
Builder class for creating AlphaZeroConfig instances. Provides a fluent API for configuration with sensible defaults and validation.

Default values:

  • boardSize: 11
  • mctsIterations: 100
  • temperature: 1.0
  • cpuct: 1.4
  • modelPath: "src/main/resources/models/hex_model_correct.zip"
  • loadExistingModel: false

All setter methods return the builder instance to enable method chaining.

Author:
Team 04

  • Method Details

    • boardSize

      public AlphaZeroConfig.Builder boardSize(int boardSize)
      Sets the size of the Hex board.
      Parameters:
      boardSize - the board size (must be positive)
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if boardSize is not positive

    • mctsIterations

      public AlphaZeroConfig.Builder mctsIterations(int mctsIterations)
      Sets the number of MCTS simulations to perform per move. More iterations improve move quality but increase computation time.
      Parameters:
      mctsIterations - the number of MCTS iterations (must be positive)
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if mctsIterations is not positive

    • temperature

      public AlphaZeroConfig.Builder temperature(double temperature)
      Sets the temperature parameter for move selection. Controls the randomness of move selection from the MCTS visit distribution.
      Parameters:
      temperature - the temperature value (must be non-negative, where 0.0 = deterministic and higher values = more random)
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if temperature is negative

    • cpuct

      public AlphaZeroConfig.Builder cpuct(double cpuct)
      Sets the CPUCT exploration constant for the PUCT formula. Higher values encourage exploration of less-visited nodes.
      Parameters:
      cpuct - the CPUCT constant (must be non-negative, typical values: 1.0-2.0)
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if cpuct is negative

    • modelPath

      public AlphaZeroConfig.Builder modelPath(String modelPath)
      Sets the file path for saving or loading the neural network model.
      Parameters:
      modelPath - the path to the model file (must not be null or empty)
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if modelPath is null or empty

    • loadExistingModel

      public AlphaZeroConfig.Builder loadExistingModel(boolean loadExistingModel)
      Sets whether to load an existing model from disk. If true, the model will be loaded from the specified modelPath. If false, a new model will be initialized with random weights.
      Parameters:
      loadExistingModel - true to load existing model, false to create new
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining

    • build

      public AlphaZeroConfig build()
      Builds and returns an immutable AlphaZeroConfig instance with the configured parameters. All parameters have been validated by their respective setter methods.
      Returns:
      a new AlphaZeroConfig instance with the specified configuration
